about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered how game AI works? Why some enemies are so smart and some are stupid? Do you want to create your own unique AI? That’s what we are going to show you in this game.

Robot Master is a programming robot combat game. In the game you have to program the AI for your robots to fight the rivals. In each level, you will face different enemies and you have to use different commands to accomplish various tasks.
detailed_description:
Have you ever wondered how game AI works? Why some enemies are so smart and some are stupid? Do you want to create your own unique AI? That’s what we are going to show you in this game.

Robot Master is a programming robot combat game. In the game you have to program the AI for your robots to fight the rivals. In each level, you will face different enemies and you have to use different commands to accomplish various tasks.

name: ROBOT MASTER Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: atom z3735f
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: i5-4210m
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
